item.description:
tags:: [[+Daily Notes]]

Sunday, August 31, 2025

<< [[Timestamps/2025/08-August/2025-08-30-Saturday|Yesterday]] | [[Timestamps/2025/09-September/2025-09-01-Monday|Tomorrow]] >>

📅 Weekend's Tasks:

🌞 This weekend, I...
  • Managed to study a bit about [[Obsidian]]
  • Managed to add two Community plugins: "Templater" and "Dataview" Obsidian Daily Note Template: https://dannb.org/blog/2022/obsidian-daily-note-template/ Raw code for Daily Note Template Gist: https://gist.github.com/dannberg/48ea2ba3fc0abdf3f219c6ad8bc78eb6

![[Pasted image 20250831223257.png|400]]

🙌 One thing I'm excited about right now is...
  • Getting closer to create my new blog as a [[Static Site]] still deciding on the hosting choices (the picture bellow is just for reference), since I've already have one here locally
  • Bellow a screenshot from

![[Hugo Site.png|900]]

tags:: [[+Daily Notes]]

Monday, September 01, 2025

<< [[Timestamps/2025/08-August/2025-08-31-Sunday|Yesterday]] | [[Timestamps/2025/09-September/2025-09-02-Tuesday|Tomorrow]] >>

📅 Daily Questions

🌜 Last night, after work, I...

Study a bit about Consensus and Zotero

👉 In short:

  • [[Consensus]] = research discovery + summaries.

  • [[Zotero]] = reference library + citation manager.

🙌 One thing I'm excited about right now is...

Ollama
